ReDiscoverData.name: La Caciotta
ReDiscoverData.description: An ancient artisanal caciotta cheese, famous for its unique flavor.

ReDiscoverData.name: Rieti Underground
ReDiscoverData.description: A fascinating route beneath the city of Rieti, amidst history and mystery.

ReDiscoverData.name: Flavio Vespasiano Theater
ReDiscoverData.description: Magnificent historic theater in Rieti, an example of neoclassical architecture.

ReDiscoverData.name: Colosseum
ReDiscoverData.description: The largest amphitheater in the world, symbol of ancient Rome.

ReDiscoverData.name: Trevi Fountain
ReDiscoverData.description: One of the most famous fountains in the world, a masterpiece of Roman Baroque.

ReDiscoverData.name: Pantheon
ReDiscoverData.description: Ancient Roman temple dedicated to all gods, now a Christian basilica.

ReDiscoverData.name: Uffizi Gallery
ReDiscoverData.description: One of the most important art museums in the world, featuring Renaissance masterpieces.

ReDiscoverData.name: Ponte Vecchio
ReDiscoverData.description: Historic medieval bridge in Florence, famous for its artisan shops.

ReDiscoverData.name: St. Mark's Square
ReDiscoverData.description: The main square of Venice, famous for St. Mark's Basilica.

ReDiscoverData.name: Grand Canal
ReDiscoverData.description: The main canal in Venice, traversed by gondolas and water buses (vaporettos).

ReDiscoverData.name: Basilica of San Bernardino
ReDiscoverData.description: Important place of worship in L'Aquila, dedicated to San Bernardino of Siena.

ReDiscoverData.name: Fountain of the 99 Spouts
ReDiscoverData.description: Historic fountain in L'Aquila, symbol of the city with its numerous spouts.

ReDiscoverData.name: Casa Manu
ReDiscoverData.description: Historic house located in the center of L'Aquila, famous for its traditional architecture.

ReDiscoverData.name: Casa Giac and Raffo
ReDiscoverData.description: Ancient residence in the heart of L'Aquila, representative of the local culture.

ReDiscoverData.name: Casa Giac Rieti
ReDiscoverData.description: Historic residence located in Rieti, an example of traditional Reatine architecture.

ReDiscoverData.name: University of L'Aquila - Coppito
ReDiscoverData.description: University campus located in Coppito, L'Aquila, a center for education and research. A place of suffering.
